Come to Pink Vice. Ask for Ava.
You come down, I give you good girl.
TEXT: 过来，给你介绍一个好女孩。

ID: Of course, it says on passport.
Look, I did not kill her. I was set up.
TEXT: 看，我没有杀掉她。我是被陷害的。

ID: Do not believe the Republian lies.
TEXT: 不要相信那些雷帕布里亚人的谎话。

ID: Today is beautiful day, my friend.
TEXT: 今天天气真好，我的朋友。

ID: We finally become free from Antegrian tyranny!
TEXT: 我们终于从安特格林的暴政中逃离出来了！

ID: Please be kind to my wife, she is just after me.
TEXT: 请友好的对待我的妻子，她就在我后边。

ID: Let my wife pass. She is coming to you next.
TEXT: 让我的妻子过去。她就是下一个过来的。

ID: They would not give me permit. I have no choice.
TEXT: 他们不给我许可。我别无选择。

ID: I will be killed if I return to Antegria.
TEXT: 如果我回到安特格林我会被杀的。

ID: Why did you turn my husband away?
TEXT: 你为什么不让我的丈夫通过？

ID: I will not leave him to die.
TEXT: 我不会把他留在这等死的。

ID: Give my card to any engineers you meet.
TEXT: 把我的名片给你见到的任何工程师。

ID: I come back in few days.
Pay you 5 credits for each engineer that calls me.
TEXT: 每为我找一个给我打电话的工程师就给你五元。

ID: You make a mistake but I let you fix it.
TEXT: 你犯了错误但是我让你改正了它。

ID: Oh. Huh. ; Huh. ; They are hiring?
TEXT: 哦。嗯。 ; 嗯。 ; 他们被录用了？

ID: Forget it, take them both. I don't want.
TEXT: 忘了它吧，把它们都拿走。我不想要了。

ID: Is good card, yes? ; Thanks ; These were not cheap you know. ;
TEXT: 是张好名片，对吧？ ; 谢谢 ; 这些并不便宜，你知道的。 ;

ID: How many engineers did you meet?
You gave my cards to no one.
TEXT: 你没有把我的名片给任何人。

ID: I'm lucky that he is good lead.
TEXT: 我很幸运他是个好老板。

ID: Last one was a fool. Didn't know basics.
TEXT: 最后一个是个白痴。连基础的都不懂。
三个是土木工程师。没什么用。

ID: I need mechanicals. I told you.
TEXT: 我需要懂机械的。我和你说过。

ID: Anyway, is ok. Last guy very sharp.
TEXT: 不管怎样还好了。最后一个很犀利。

ID: I heard that you are from Nirsk?
TEXT: 我听说你来自于尼尔斯克？

ID: I grew up there but I have not been back in many years.
TEXT: 我在那长大但是我好多年没回去了。

ID: @It is still a shit-hole. As before.
TEXT: @那里仍然是个屎一样的地方，跟以前一样。

ID: Haha, of course. This is what I remember too.
TEXT: 哈哈，当然了。我也是这么记得的。

ID: I am Sergiu. It is good to meet you.
I will do my best to keep you safe.
TEXT: 我会尽我所能保障你的安全。

ID: My aim is not like before.
TEXT: 我的梦想是和以前不同的了。

ID: There is more action at this checkpoint than in the war.
TEXT: 跟战争时期比起来，这个边检站多了很多功能。

ID: I fought in Kolechia for 5 years.
TEXT: 我在科洛奇亚服役了五年。

ID: If you think it is bad in Arstotzka, it is ten times worse in Kolechia.
TEXT: 如果你认为在阿什托兹卡很糟，在科洛奇亚要更糟十倍。

ID: I do not blame them for coming here.
TEXT: 我不会因为他们来到这而责备他们。

ID: Anyways, you are doing well. Keep it up.
TEXT: 不管怎样，做的不错。坚持下去。

ID: I have a small favor to ask.
During the war, I met a beautiful girl.
TEXT: 战争期间，我认识了一个美丽的姑娘。

ID: I think about her every moment.
Yesterday I receive word that she is finally coming here.
TEXT: 昨天我得到消息她终于要来这了。

ID: Please, let her pass and I will be in your debt.
TEXT: 求你了，让她通过.我欠你个人情。

ID: She says our first son will have your name.
TEXT: 她说我们的第一个儿子会以你的名字命名。

ID: This is fine but I told her I want a daughter first!
TEXT: 这很好，但是我跟她说过我想先要个女儿！

ID: I would like to show the locket to her.
TEXT: 我想给她看看这个小盒。

ID: Ah, I missed not having this with me.
TEXT: 啊，我忘了没有带在身上。

ID: It is not much, but we have found a small way to thank you.
TEXT: 这并不多，但是我们找到了一个谢谢你的小方法。

ID: Elisa will deliver it to your home. I hope that it helps.
TEXT: Elisa会把它交到你家。我希望它能有帮助。

ID: Tomorrow I am transferred to another post.
TEXT: 明天我会调到其他岗位。

ID: @She arrived, but her papers were not in order.
TEXT: @她来过了，但是她的证件有问题。

ID: @Tell her to try again with the correct documents.
TEXT: @让她拿着正确的文件再试一次。

ID: If you have the locket, give it back to me.
TEXT: 如果你有那个小盒，把它还给我。

ID: He said you were friend. That you would help.
TEXT: 他说你们是朋友。你会提供帮助。
求你了，我的家人不见了。

ID: @You do not have the required documentation.
They would not allow me to leave.
Please, tell Sergiu I will always love him.
TEXT: 求你了，告诉Sergiu我永远爱他。

ID: We will be together in another life.
TEXT: 我们下辈子再在一起吧。

ID: Return this for him to remember me.
I will never forget your kindness.
There is nothing for me here any more.
TEXT: 这里再也没有什么属于我了。

ID: I am guard here. My name is Calensk.
TEXT: 我是这的警卫。我叫卡雷斯克。

ID: They told me I get good position, then send me here.
TEXT: 他们告诉我，我得到了一个好工作，然后把我送到了这里。

ID: Now they pay me almost nothing.
TEXT: 现在他们几乎什么都没付给我。
@他们应当给我们相同的奖励。

ID: I get small bonus when you detain people.
TEXT: 当你抓住人的时候，我会得到一点的奖励。

ID: More you detain, more they give me for processing.
TEXT: 你抓的越多，他们会给我更多。

ID: But this is not fair, right? You should get something too.
TEXT: 但这一点也不公平，对吗？你也应该得到奖励。

ID: I give you 5 credits from my bonus for every two people you detain.
TEXT: 你每抓住两个人，我都会从奖励中拿出5块给你。

ID: Sounds like good deal to me.
TEXT: 这主意对我来说不错啊。

ID: I give money to you after I get paid.
Let us make the best of this.
TEXT: 我们要好好利用这一点。

ID: For bonus and selling bomb parts.
TEXT: 为了奖励和卖炸弹零件。

ID: They move our station to prison.
TEXT: 他们把我们的驻地放到监狱里了。

ID: We still get bonus so keep detaining.~
TEXT: 我们仍然会得到奖励的，所以，继续抓人吧。

ID: I will drop off money at your home instead.
I am getting nothing because of you.
TEXT: 因为你，我什么都没做成。

ID: Detain more people and we will both benefit.
TEXT: 抓住更多的人，那样我们会得到更多的奖励。

ID: You are not detaining enough people.
I have nothing to give you.
Detain more to share part of my bonus.
TEXT: 抓更多的人，这样才能分得我的奖励。

ID: Bonus is good, they pay ok.
TEXT: 奖励还不错，他们付的钱也差不多。

ID: Maybe you detain more people and we do better.
TEXT: 或许你能抓更多的人，我们会做得更好。

ID: My wife sick now. Neighbor spreads the flu.
TEXT: 我的妻子现在病了，是邻居传染的流感。

ID: This is what is left after medicine.
TEXT: 这就是买完药之后剩下的了。

ID: I give you rest next time.
Maybe you detain more people to make it easier.
TEXT: 可能你为了让情况好一些拘留更多的人。

ID: This is all I have now but soon I make up rest.
TEXT: 我现在总共就这么多但我会很快补上剩下的。

ID: Again it is a little short.
Keep detaining and I pay you back soon.
TEXT: 继续拘留人，我会很快给你钱的。

ID: For that little thing? No of course not.
TEXT: 就为了那个小东西？当然不用了。

ID: Just disable it. Open the cover.
TEXT: 把它毁了就行，打开盖子。

ID: Could not even add a display.
This is poorest bomb I ever see. A simple mind created this.
TEXT: 这种炸弹简直是我所见过最低级的。设计它的人绝对头脑简单。

ID: Just cut the wires in order.
TEXT: 快点按顺序把线子切断。

ID: Ok, all done. Back to work.
Bullshit. I need to earn money today.
TEXT: 放屁。我今天还得挣钱呢。

ID: I sell materials and give you cut.
I doubt it is even worth much.
TEXT: 我怀疑它值不了多少钱。
你使阿什托兹卡感到骄傲。~

ID: Perhaps it was mistake to rely on lottery.
TEXT: 或许依靠运气是一种错误。

ID: It makes me look like fool to trust lottery.~
TEXT: 相信运气让我看起来很傻。~

ID: Let this motivate you to improve.~
It is too early to come all the way out here.
The smell at this checkpoint makes me sick.
TEXT: 这个检查点的味道让我感到恶心。

ID: Where is plaque I gave you?
Why is it not on wall?
What is other shit hanging here?
TEXT: 这里挂着的其他东西是什么?

ID: These walls are for official plaques only.
TEXT: 这些墙是用来挂正式牌子的。

ID: Your pay will be docked for violation.
TEXT: 你将因为违规而停发工资。

ID: At least you are performing well.
At least your performance is not terrible.
Maybe you have forgotten what your job is.
TEXT: 可能你已经忘了你的工作是什么了。

ID: There are many more who can take your place.
I have old friend coming through.
I do not want to hear of any trouble to her.
TEXT: 我不想听到她有任何麻烦。

ID: Shae thinks I am powerless fool now.
TEXT: Shae认为我现在是个没权力的蠢蛋。

ID: It was made very clear to let her through.
TEXT: 已经说得很清楚了让她通过。

ID: Now I must think about the consequences for you.~
TEXT: 现在我必须为你考虑后果。~

ID: Maybe this place not so bad.
TEXT: 也许这个地方还不算太糟。

ID: With everything going on, checkpoint visit is nice break.~
TEXT: 在百忙之中来视察一次检查点是很好的休息。~

ID: You still do not hang the plaques.
Why do you not hang both plaques?
TEXT: 你为什么不把两个牌匾都挂上？

ID: But again you have unauthorized items on wall.
TEXT: 但是你的私人物品又一次出现在了墙上。

ID: But what is other shit hanging here?
TEXT: 但是这是什么鬼东西挂在这儿？

ID: These walls are for official plaques only.
TEXT: 这些墙上只允许挂上官方的牌匾。

ID: Your pay will be docked for violation.
TEXT: 因违观你的报酬将被削减。

ID: I hear he runs checkpoint now.
TEXT: 我听说他正管理着边检站。

ID: It looks like somewhere he would fit in.
I bet he is still terrible boss.
TEXT: 我打赌他仍然是个糟糕的老大。

ID: You know, Dimitri asked me to come.
But I guess he is not so much in control.
TEXT: 我猜他脑子不是太清醒。

ID: I hope Dimitri tires more easily now.
I do not want to stay long in Arstotzka.
TEXT: 我不想长时间呆在阿什托兹卡。

ID: Ah, I would not do that.

TEXT: Dimitri不是一个宽宏大量的人。

ID: This is inconvenience, but I am not worried for myself.
TEXT: 这不太方便，但是我一点也不担心我自己。
一文不值的穷光蛋一个~

ID: I had to pull many strings to get Shae out.
TEXT: 我要用绳子把Shae给弄出来。

ID: It was made very clear to let her through.~
My patience with you has run out.~
Simon Wens took her from me.~
TEXT: Simon Wens 从我手上把她弄走了。~

ID: I follow him for many weeks.
I know he comes here soon.~
TEXT: 我知道他一会儿会来这里。~

ID: It is big favor I ask, but is important.
TEXT: 帮帮这个大忙，这很重要。

ID: Let him through if you see him.
TEXT: 如果你看见他，先放他走。

ID: You give me his passport and I track him down.~
TEXT: 你给我他的护照，我去跟踪他。

ID: I make him suffer like he did to Julia.~
TEXT: 我要像他对Julia所做的那样对他报仇。

ID: Now please, give back my daughter's photo.
TEXT: 现在，请把我女儿的照片还回来。

ID: I show it to him while he suffers.
TEXT: 我要在他被折磨的时候给他看。
她还是一个小女孩而已。

ID: @I do not know what you are talking about.
She was just a little girl.
TEXT: 她还是一个小女孩而已。

ID: What? I asked you to let him pass.
TEXT: 什么？我不是叫你他通过的吗？

ID: There will be no true justice now.
TEXT: 他将再也不会受到真正的制裁。

ID: @I do not know. Back into Kolechia.
TEXT: @我不知道。也许回科洛奇亚了吧。

ID: You fools better to not touch me.
I will explode like wild tiger.
I have every right to enter Arstotzka.
TEXT: 我有权进入阿什托兹卡。

ID: You think I am joking but tiger does not joke.
TEXT: 你或许觉得我在说笑，但老虎是不会说笑的。

ID: I write report on conditions in Arstotzka.
TEXT: 我会写一份阿什托兹卡的报道。

ID: @Your press pass is worthless for entry.
I will not lay down for your corrupt abuses.
TEXT: 我不会屈服于你的公报私仇。

ID: You are slowest inspector I have ever seen.
TEXT: 你是我见过的最迟缓的检查员。
难怪阿什托兹卡那么糟。

ID: Maybe few days, maybe few weeks.
I am reporter and have right to enter.
TEXT: 我是记者，我有权利进入。

ID: I worked with your father for many years.
TEXT: 我和你父亲共事了多年。

ID: You were such a little brat.
I go back to Nirsk and tell them you are doing well here.
TEXT: 我回到尼尔斯科后会跟乡里说你做得很好。

ID: Just not so little any more.
I have only passport but hear me out.~
TEXT: 我只有护照但是听我说。~

ID: There is little time. I must enter today.
TEXT: 没有时间了，我必须进去。

ID: I come back in 3 days with right papers.~
TEXT: 我会在三天以后带着所需的证件回来。~

ID: To prove, I give you something important.
TEXT: 我会给你一些重要的东西作为证明。
这是独一无二的家传宝。~
放在你那里，当是抵押品。~

ID: I will be back to pick it up.~
I get it back in few days.

TEXT: 阿什托兹卡人都一个样！

ID: I will not leave without watch.

TEXT: 这是堂哥送给我的昂贵礼物！
只需要换新电池就能动了。

ID: I come back in few days to pick up watch.
TEXT: 几天后我会回来取我的表。

ID: I used to have watch like that.
For sure he is not coming back.
Let me take it off your hands.
Guy behind me in line would not shut up about it.
TEXT: 我后面那个人嘴里一直念叨个不停。

ID: On and on about how important is to family.~
TEXT: 总是说这个对家庭多么重要~

ID: Is good watch, I can see.
I give you 20 credits for it right now.
He say he pay you back only 10 credits.
Is good deal here I offer you.
As promised, I am back with right papers now.
TEXT: 我遵守了承诺，带着说好的证件回来了。

ID: I was to give you nice reward.
TEXT: 我本打算好好报答你的。
现在我只需要电池就行了。

ID: Wow. You are pretty honest person.
You know, I cannot take this.

TEXT: 那刮痕之前就已经有了。

ID: I start to think maybe all Arstotzkans are not so bad.
TEXT: 我开始觉得阿什托兹卡也不是尽是坏人。
可是所有证件都没问题啊！
所有阿什托兹卡人都一样。

ID: I will not leave without watch.

TEXT: 这是表哥送我的昂贵礼物！

ID: I will not leave without money.
I give you watch to hold.

TEXT: 这手表是表哥给我的礼物。

ID: I hope you got good money for it.
TEXT: 我希望你有足够的钱来赔它。
该死的阿什托兹卡骗子。

ID: I think someone stole it from locker room.
TEXT: 我觉得是有人从更衣室把它给偷走了。

ID: I have carried this for years, maybe you take it.
TEXT: 我已经带着这个很多年了，你就笑纳吧。
@你的阿什托兹卡身份证丢失了。

ID: I know man. I told you.
Thanks bud, is good to be home!
Gonna tell coach about this crap.
I give you that great banner.~
Listen, I tell my coach about this.
TEXT: 听着，我会告诉我的教练这件事的。

ID: Say if I do not get banner back, I lose front seat on team bus.~
TEXT: 如果我没有得到旗帜就回来，我就失去了球队大巴的前排座位。~

ID: All seats good, but front seat definitely best.
TEXT: 所有座位都很好，但前排座椅绝对是最好的。

ID: So I really just need banner back.
TEXT: 所以，只需要将旗帜赢回来。

ID: Do not forget to root for us!
It is more beaten up than I remember.
TEXT: 比我记忆中打得还要惨。

ID: Even there is big tear here.
Oh well. Coach should be happy.
TEXT: 哦，好吧。教练应该会很高兴。

ID: Do not forget to root for us at regionals.
TEXT: 不要忘了在地区赛里为我们加油。

ID: At least you give banner back right?
TEXT: 至少你能把旗帜还回来吧？

ID: At least you give banner back.
TEXT: 你至少能把旗帜还回来。

ID: If guards do not kill me, coach will.
TEXT: 就算警卫没杀了我，教练也会的。

ID: You must hold on to these.
I am being followed by an imposter.
TEXT: 我正在被一个骗子跟踪。

ID: They pretend to be from the Ministry of Information but it is a lie.
TEXT: 他们假装是从信息部来的，但他们在说谎。

ID: If they ask for documents, give these instead.
TEXT: 如果他们要求拿文件，就用这些来代替。

ID: I am from the Ministry of Information.
You have something to give us.
Bet you have no real strength.
TEXT: 我敢打赌你没什么力量。

ID: Come to gym, I make you big.
TEXT: 来健身房吧，我会让你变成大块头的。

ID: I guarantee you get big at Get Big Town.
TEXT: 我保证你会在大力城里变成大块头的。

ID: This is what I expect from skinny weakling.
TEXT: 我就猜到瘦小挫逼会这么干。

ID: I used to be an inspector like you.
TEXT: 我曾经和你一样，是一名检查员。

ID: Many years ago. Back in United Fed.~
TEXT: 许多年前。在联邦调查局。~

ID: It is all done by computers now.
TEXT: 现在这活儿都由电脑做了。

ID: They can deny much faster that way.
TEXT: 这样他们可以更快地拒绝别人入境。
什么？我为什么要被拒绝？~

ID: So this is what it feels like.~
TEXT: 原来被拒绝的感觉是这样的。~

ID: Eh, it does not matter what I say.
Just deny the visa and I will go.
TEXT: 刚刚拒绝了签证，我会去的。

ID: I have better job offer in Impor.
TEXT: 我在印玻有更好的工作机会。

ID: Red stamp and I can break contract in Arstotzka.
TEXT: 有了拒签章，我就可以在阿什托兹卡打破合同。

ID: I am sure you deny people all day.
TEXT: 我想你应该整天都在拒绝别人。
我想到了一些其他的事情。

ID: Ok, now I get free from this bad job.
TEXT: 好了，现在我能摆脱这种烂工作。
我是为医疗原因而来的。

ID: Surgery I need is outlawed in Kolechia.
TEXT: 我需要做的手术在科洛奇亚是被禁止的。

ID: Even so, I do not trust doctors there.
TEXT: 即便如此，我也不相信那里的医生。
只有阿什托兹卡有熟练的外科医生。

ID: @You do not have the right documents.
They will not give papers for surgery.
TEXT: 他们不会为了手术而给我文件的。

ID: Thank you. I will not forget this.
I do not know how long I survive.
TEXT: 我不知道我还能活多久。

ID: I hope you are not in same place as me.
TEXT: 我希望你的处境和我不同。

ID: Can I have note back now?
TEXT: 我可以收回我的评语吗？

ID: I need it for next inspector.
TEXT: 我需要把它给下一个检查员。

ID: But I give you such lovely note!
TEXT: 但是我给了你这么好的评语！

ID: Thanks and like I say, you super guy.
TEXT: 谢谢，就像我说的，你是个大好人。

ID: Is too much. I can see that now.
TEXT: 实在是太多了。我现在就可以看得出来。

ID: Next time I make couple copies first.
TEXT: 下一次，我先弄几份拷贝来。

ID: Wow, nobody say such nice things!
TEXT: 哇，没人说过这么美好的话！

ID: Part about visa is confusing but rest is very powerful.
TEXT: 关于签证的部分让人感到迷惑，但其余的都很厉害。
今天真是美好的一天呢！

ID: Some guy I do not even know.
TEXT: 我连认识都不认识的人。

ID: It was a mistake to open this checkpoint.
TEXT: 开放这个边检站是一个错误。

ID: This checkpoint is smaller than I expected.
TEXT: 这个检查站比我预想的要小。

ID: I have waited in this damn line since for 8 hours.
TEXT: 我已经在这该死的队伍里等了8小时了。

ID: I hope it was worth it.
You are lucky to have a job still.

ID: What? I do not know. To visit?
Entry permit? I have ticket here.
TEXT: 入境许可？我这里有准入券。

ID: I paid good money for ticket.
TEXT: 这准入券花了我好多钱。

ID: I am so happy that the border has opened.
TEXT: 我很高兴的是，边界已经打开。

ID: I will visit my son. I have not seen him in six years. [Speech/Purpose]
TEXT: 我要去见我的儿子。我已经六年没见过他了。[口才/目的]

ID: Please, let me pass. My son is waiting.
TEXT: 请让我过去。我的儿子在等我呢。

ID: Just deny my passport and I will go away.
TEXT: 我的护照刚被拒，我会走开的。

ID: It is not my choice. I hate this damn country.
TEXT: 这不是我的选择。我恨这个该死的国家。

ID: I give you 10 credits to let me through.
Why you turn down good money?
@You cannot bribe an officer of Arstotzka.
TEXT: @你不能贿赂阿什托兹卡官员。

ID: They must pay well for such obedience, dog.
TEXT: 他们一定给你很多钱让你这么听话，贱狗。

ID: First, you give papers back to me.
TEXT: 首先，你得把文件还给我。

ID: This id supplement is total pain.
TEXT: 这个临时身份证太折腾人了。

ID: Was not easy to get and only lasts few days.
TEXT: 它很不容易弄到，并且只能持续几天。

ID: You Arstotzkans just make it harder and harder.
TEXT: 你们阿什托兹卡人让事情变得越来越困难。
为什么还要开放边境呢？

ID: Would be better to spend money on bribe.
TEXT: 倒不如把钱花在贿赂上。
少一些麻烦，速度还更快。

ID: I knew it would not even work.
TEXT: 我就知道它根本不会管用。

ID: @Just when starting to look for criminals.
TEXT: @正当我刚要去找罪犯的时候。

ID: @Do not bring your sickness to Arstotzka.
TEXT: @不要把你的病传给阿什托兹卡人。

TEXT: 这么轻易就拒绝入境了。
所有这一切文件都没用了。

ID: Thank you. It is good to be back home.
I am leaving for trip soon so I just need my passport back.
TEXT: 我马上就要出去旅行，所以我需要把我的护照拿回来。
@联系纸条上的电话来取回你的护照。

ID: You can just hand it back.
TEXT: 你可以直接把它拿回来。

ID: @It has been filed. I cannot give it back.
TEXT: @它已经被提交了。我不能把它还给你。

ID: I am not leaving without passport.
You deny entry and take passport?
TEXT: 你拒绝入境，还要拿走护照？

ID: What am I supposed to do?
You cannot do this to me!
I have right to travel freely.
I hope that things are better here.
TEXT: 我希望这里的情况更好一些。

ID: What? I was promised asylum here.
TEXT: 什么？我被承诺说能在这里得到庇护。

ID: I have nowhere else to go.
You Arstotzkans keep changing rules here.
TEXT: 你们阿什托兹卡人一直都在更改规则。

ID: My sister came through last week with different documents.
TEXT: 上周我姐姐带着不同的文件过来。

ID: Now I need new access permit.
TEXT: 现在我需要新的访问许可证。

ID: Costs twice as much as before.
What the hell is access permit?
TEXT: 访问许可证是什么意思？

ID: Never heard of it. Sounds stupid.
TEXT: 从来没有听说过。听起来很蠢。

ID: @Entry permit and supplement are no longer accepted.
TEXT: @不再受理入境许可证和补充。

ID: I do not care about your job.
I've heard this is very strict checkpoint.
TEXT: 我听说这是个非常严格的检查点。

ID: I am glad my papers are in order.
TEXT: 我很高兴我的文件没问题。

ID: I have heard the border will close.
My access permit will not arrive in time.
TEXT: 我无法及时拿到我的访问许可证。

ID: Yes I know. I just told you that.
TEXT: 是的，我知道。我只是告诉你这点。

ID: I am afraid the border will close before I can enter.
TEXT: 恐怕在我入境之前边境就将关闭。

ID: What is this plaque on the wall?
TEXT: 墙上的这个牌匾是什么？

ID: What is this on the wall?

TEXT: 你因工作称职受到表扬？

ID: Impressive. Why even bother with plaque?
TEXT: 令人印象深刻。为什么还要放块牌匾呢？
你因工作出色受到表扬？

ID: I hope they give you raise and not just plaque.
TEXT: 我希望他们给你加薪，而不只是给块牌匾。

ID: This one looks like cheap shit.
TEXT: 这一块看起来就跟廉价垃圾似的。

ID: I thought we have Arskickers connection.
TEXT: 我还以为我们在阿什踢菊队里有关系呢。

ID: What is this drawing on the wall?

TEXT: 我的狗都能画得更好看。
或许他应该去尝试一下运动。

ID: The drawing is not so bad really.
I was just in rough mood. Sorry.
TEXT: 我只是心情不太好。抱歉。

ID: You deny me for comment about drawing, right?
TEXT: 你因为我对绘画的评论而拒绝我，对吗？

ID: Is this because I make fun of drawing?
TEXT: 这是不是因为我取笑绘画的原因？
画作应该放在博物馆里！

ID: I like picture on wall here.
TEXT: 我喜欢这墙上挂着的画作。

ID: Reminds me of how my family was.
TEXT: 让我想起了自己的家人是什么样子的。

ID: It is too easy to lose them.
What is the purpose of your trip?

TEXT: 我从这个国家中转到其他地方。
我从这里中转到其他地方。
我正移民到阿什托兹卡。

ID: I am coming to live with my husband.
TEXT: 我来这里与我丈夫团聚。

ID: I am coming to live with my wife.
TEXT: 我来这里与我妻子团聚。

ID: I was called to diplomatic discussions.
TEXT: 我被召来商讨外交事宜。

ID: This entry permit is for work.
TEXT: 这个入境许可是工作许可。

ID: You are authorized for transit only.
You have only a visitors entry permit.
TEXT: 你只有旅游的入境许可。

ID: This entry permit is for immigrating.
TEXT: 这个入境许可仅用来移民。

ID: Your entry purpose does not match up.
This entry permit purpose does not match.
TEXT: 这个入境许可上所写的意图不相符。

ID: The length of your stay is different.
This document is missing its seal.
I do not see the required seal here.
This grant is not sealed properly.
TEXT: 这份许可的印章盖得不对。

ID: I have no idea what you are talking about.
I do not know anything about that.
You cannot enter using an expired document.
TEXT: 你不能用一份过期的证件入境。

ID: I could not come until now.
TEXT: 我直到现在才有机会来。

ID: What? That is mistake. I just renewed it.
TEXT: 什么？你搞错了吧。我刚刚续期了。

ID: That must be a typographical error.
There was nothing I could do.
I was not able to get one.
I did not know it was required.
I will get one after I enter.
TEXT: 等我入境后就能拿到一份。

ID: I left before they were issued.
TEXT: 我走了之后他们才发证。

ID: You must carry an id supplement.
TEXT: 你必须携带身份证补充证明。
你的身份证补充证明呢？

ID: This was not provided to me.
You have no grant for asylum.
I could not secure one in time.
You are not authorized to work this long.
TEXT: 你的工作时间没有这么长。

ID: This work pass expires before your visit.
TEXT: 这份工作通行证在你来之前就过期了。

ID: I will renew the pass soon.
I am planning to renew it.
My entry permit is longer than I need.
TEXT: 我的入境许可比我要的时间更长。

ID: There are two different numbers here.
It must be a mistake. The document is valid.
TEXT: 肯定搞错了。这份证件是有效的。

ID: This does not look like you.
I do not know what to say. It is me.
TEXT: 我不知道该说什么，这的确是我的照片。
你的护照上有不实信息。

ID: It says here that you are male.
TEXT: 上面写着你的性别是男人。

ID: Your passport says you are female.
TEXT: 你的护照上写着你是个女人。

ID: Are you a woman or a man?
TEXT: 你到底是男的还是女的？

ID: There is a problem with your documentation.

TEXT: 只有阿什托兹卡人才能入境。
欧布里斯坦人不得通过
安特格利亚人不得通过
雷帕布里亚人不得通过
阿什托兹卡人不得通过

ID: Who do you think you are?
You have no authority for this!
You have been selected for a random search.
TEXT: 你被挑选为一项随机搜查的对象。

ID: This ticket is for another day.
TEXT: 这张票不是今天使用的。

ID: The date on this ticket is wrong.
You cannot enter without a ticket.
Foreigners must present an entry ticket.
I do not know what that is.
TEXT: 我不知道那是什么来的。

ID: There is no record of this name.
Your fingerprints do not match our records.
TEXT: 你的指纹与我们的记录不相符。

ID: There is zero tolerance for contraband.
TEXT: 我们对携带违禁品实行零容忍政策。

ID: You have made a mistake coming here.
TEXT: 你来这里是走错地方了。

ID: This information does not look correct.
TEXT: 这个信息看起来不正确。
你的身高跟上面写的不同。
也许跟我穿的鞋子有关系。
因为我穿的衣服不一样。

ID: Maybe you should not have come.
We have some questions for you.
Let me through or you will regret it.
TEXT: 让我过去，否则你会后悔的。

ID: I do not like your tone.
This does not sound like you.
TEXT: 你的嗓音听起来不像你。

ID: You do not match this description.
TEXT: 你这人跟上面写的不一样。

ID: How can you say for sure?
Your thumb print does not match.
Your diplomatic authorization does not cover Arstotzka.
TEXT: 你的外交授权范围不包括阿什托兹卡。

ID: You have no diplomatic rights here.
This authorization does not include Arstotzka.
TEXT: 这份授权不包括阿什托兹卡。
去跟你的上级核实一下。

TEXT: 所有入境者必须接种了疫苗。

TEXT: 我才不相信什么疫苗呢。
这份接种证明已经过期了。

TEXT: 你没有必须的接种疫苗证明。
这个接种疫苗证明不充分。
现在我身上到处是墨水了。
